entry_point.FQNAME: HW4_GUI.OmokAction OmokAction(java.lang.String name, javax.swing.ImageIcon icon, java.lang.String descr, int mnemonic, int accelerator, java.lang.Runnable runnable)

problem.description: Should be one of: InputEvent.SHIFT_MASK, InputEvent.CTRL_MASK, InputEvent.META_MASK, InputEvent.ALT_MASK, ... or their combination
